comment.author: 33413158@N03
comment._content: In January of 1912, a fire spread through the dumbwaiter elevator system of the Equitable Building in Brooklyn: www.bklyn-genealogy-info.com/Newspaper/Disasters/1912.Equ...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thank you for helping us to more precisely date this image. We'll add the information to our source catalog.
